blockbuster.title: BLOCKBUSTER
blockbuster.description: Ray has gone missing. Investigate the comet and gear up to recruit a team of superheroes. Find Ray and bring her back home!

fortnitemares.title: Fortnitemares
fortnitemares.description: Explore Vlad's haunted Hexsylvanian kingdom in Fortnitemares!

season11.frostnite.title: FROSTNITE
season11.frostnite.description: Frostnite returns! Get ready to heat things up and fight the cold and deadly storm.

hordev.title: SURVIVE THE HORDE
hordev.description: Join the fight against the unstoppable Horde! Do you have what it takes to survive?

stwhuntmonster.title: HUNT THE TITAN
stwhuntmonster.description: Track down the Mist Titan and eliminate it before it escapes.

mayday.title: Hit the Road
mayday.description: Bring music to the masses in this summer adventure!

phoenix.adventure.title: VENTURE: SCURVY SHOALS
phoenix.adventure.description: Batten down the hatches for Venture in the remote islands of Scurvy Shoals!

phoenix.fortnitemares.clip.title: Clip's Nightmare
phoenix.fortnitemares.clip.description: A nauseating spell in Hexylvania. A gunsmith haunted by a figure from her past. Help Homebase dispel the curse before it's too late!

phoenix.fortnitemares.title: VENTURE: HEXSYLVANIA
phoenix.fortnitemares.description: Brave the haunted Hexsylvanian wilds in the spookiest Venture yet

phoenix.newbeginnings.title: VENTURE: FLANNEL FALLS
phoenix.newbeginnings.description: Bundle up for a lakeside storm battle in the chilliest Venture yet!

phoenix.newbeginnings.springtraining.title: Valor
phoenix.newbeginnings.springtraining.description: Major Oswald has lost his cool. Help him rediscover his inner soldier.

phoenix.roadtrip.title: VENTURE: BLASTED BADLANDS
phoenix.roadtrip.description: Level up in the Venture theater! Build a hero team to take on the new "Rage" seasonal modifier, and scavenge for weapons using Vending Machines and Repair Benches.

phoenix.roadtrip.imposter.title: IMPOSTOR!
phoenix.roadtrip.imposter.description: Search the newly discovered Blasted Badlands for a true hero.

phoenix.winterfest.title: VENTURE: FROZEN FJORDS
phoenix.winterfest.description: Bundle up for an arctic storm battle in the chilliest Venture yet!

phoenix.winterfest.ghostofchristmas.title: Red Willow's Eve
phoenix.winterfest.ghostofchristmas.description: The storm is out for holiday vengeance! Help Ray concoct the ultimate Christmas antidote.

season11.fortnitemares.quests.phase.title: THE DOOR TO DARKNESS
season11.fortnitemares.quests.phase.description: Brave a seven-night stay at Oakdirge Hollows, Stoneplancantwine's third most haunted hotel!

season11.winterfest.quests.phase.title: MISFIT TOYS
season11.winterfest.quests.phase.description: Misfit toys are loose! All they want for Christmas is vengeance!

stormking.landmark.title: KING OF MONSTERS
stormking.landmark.description: Face the Storm King in the ULTIMATE BATTLE!

season12.nodancing.quests.title: NO DANCING
season12.nodancing.quests.description: Major Oswald will not allow Homebase to suffer at the hands of the enemy - the dreaded Love Storm. Operation Broken Hearts begins at oh-eight-right now.

season12.spies.quests.title: SCHOOL OF HARD KNOX
season12.spies.quests.description: An unlikely hero arrives at Homebase. Does he have what it takes to join the fight?

outpost.title: WARGAMES
outpost.description: Enter your Storm Shield to tackle the Major's simulation challenges!

yarrrtwo.title: YARRR'S RETURN
yarrrtwo.description: Blakebeard's ghost haunts Homebase in hopes of creating a legacy. Help him move on, and keep the living safe!

season9.phase.title: BEYOND THE STELLAR HORIZON
season9.phase.description: Launch the VSS Gallant once more in the latest installment of Beyond the Stellar Horizon.

spring2019.phase.title: YARRR!
spring2019.phase.description: A black flag flies on the horizon, are pirates headed for Homebase?

starlight.title: DUNGEONS
starlight.description: Delve into some Dungeons and face off against terrifying foes!

stwbrainstorm.title: EYE OF THE BRAINSTORM
stwbrainstorm.description: On a dark and brain-stormy night, the Door to Darkness stirsâ€¦

stwfennix.title: Flight of the Fennix
stwfennix.description: After a recent loss, Riggs brings on an expert to help rebrand and train Homebase. However, something seems off about him.

stwirwin.title: Brawl of the Wild
stwirwin.description: Homebase is under siege by a menagerie of wild creatures. Help Ray, Dennis, and the mysteriously wolfy Gia make sense of the furry madness.

stwoutlandish.title: OUTLANDISH ODDITIES
stwoutlandish.description: In the face of mounting strangeness, an outlandish crew is assembled...
